attributes.action: Strip terrorists of citizenship regardless of colour or belief.
attributes.additional_details: Following the attacks in NZ and the large onslaught on Muslims throughout the world, I feel that Britain should lead by example and make all terrorists, enemies of the state and rendor them stateless, the current rise of Muslims being under attack is not punished severely enough and the terrorists feel that they are allowed to spread hate and drive their white supremacist agenda, most Muslim feels that there are double standards being played out here and it needs addressing.
attributes.background: With the huge rise of white suprecists being radicalized by the current islamaphobic agenda, I strongly believe that all terrorists irrespective of their belief should be made stateless.
